thread.title: Sidharth Malhotra wants Akshay Kumar to walk New Zealand’s Sky Tower
thread.title_full: Sidharth Malhotra wants Akshay Kumar to walk New Zealand’s Sky Tower

author: NewsWire
title: Sidharth Malhotra wants Akshay Kumar to walk New Zealand’s Sky Tower
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
New Delhi, Oct 11(ANI): Bollywood actor Sidharth Malhotra, who has been roped in as Tourism New Zealand’s first ambassador from India, started his trip to the nation by walking around the perimeter of Auckland’s tallest building, the Sky Tower at a height of 192 meters. 
Malhotra says he will suggest Akshay Kumar to try this for sure. 
On completing his first ever adventure activity in New Zealand, the ‘Brothers’ star said, “Walking around the Sky Tower, which is the tallest building in the southern hemisphere, was absolutely fantastic. I couldn’t have asked for a better kick-start for my trip, literally felt like living life on the edge. I definitely recommend my brother Akshay (Kumar) to do this.” 
According to the sources, when Sidharth told his friends he is going to New Zealand; the first thing that they told him was to ensure he does as many adventure activities as possible. This is when the young ‘Student of the Year’ actor decided that he will begin his trip with an adventure. 
As soon as he had his safety gear in place, Sidharth stepped on the narrow path-way only to realise that this is the best way to kick-start his New Zealand adventure. He had a bird eye’s view of Auckland, its hills, the harbour and the islands beyond. 
The 30-year-old actor was last spotted in Karan Malhotra’s ‘Brothers’ along with Akshay and Jacqueline Fernandes. 
Sidharth will be next seen in Shakun Batra’s ‘Kapoor and Sons’ along with Alia Bhatt and Fawad Khan in lead role. (ANI) Related Posts
